headline.main: ' BUNDLES' SENDS CASH TO LONDON HOSPITALS; Cables $11,250 in Gifts -- Other War Relief

lead_paragraph: Bundles for Britain, Inc., 745 Fifth Avenue, announced yesterday that it had cabled contributions totaling $11,250 to London, as the latest gift in its drive to aid the British. Bomb-damaged voluntary hospitals in London and the provinces and the Women's Voluntary Services will share the gift.
abstract: bundles cables funds to London hosps and Women's Volunteer Service of Brit; Independent Order B'rith Abraham gives Inter-Faith Com for Aid to Democracies funds for Brit nurseries; Med and Surgical Belief Com plans 1st aid kits and emergency operating sets drive
